amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the 1990 BRAC account by $50 million and to increase funding for the Veterans Health Administration and Medical Services account by $22 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriation for BRAC by $50,000,000, and increase the Veterans Health Administration medical services by $22,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 260 (Roll no. 494).
